Diary of Lydia:
[Another Handwriting]
I do not understand! Obviously, that's what I wrote, but I do not remember! I overcame in the mirror and I see her face reflected in me, but there is a mirror! Once the image. I am not to understand what is going on here! Where - my memory? They seem to be there, but it's foolish! He must do something to me!
All that has happened is recorded, but not Forgotten! Both regret Tailor and get satisfaction from it Luny flower on your heels to complete the contract.
I swear this is their ancient, long forgotten by name.!
